description.value: This profile is based on the AU Core profile. This profile is compliant to IPS Organization profile with no further action as the AU Core profile is compliant to IPS. However, some formal declaration is required to be provided for IG Publisher otherwise the preferred approach of deriving from IPS Bundle and IPS Composition cannot be used - a build error is triggered. At this time compliesWithProfile is used in preference to imposeProfile. This is the expected approach for the HL7 AU Patient Summary FHIR IG.
